justification: Misreads Team B’s needs and values: B has solid RBs and prefers workhorse reliability, yet is offered an Out, low-tier committee RB mislabeled as stable. B also needs immediate wins; trading a healthy Tier 2 possession WR (a clear B preference) for an uncertain RB is counter to their incentives. Minimal separation of perspectives, unrealistic acceptance probability, and a generic, inaccurate rationale.
